backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of PricingTable component from CommandCenter dashboard page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, hooks, pages, components, and authentication flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and color scheme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining AXON Remote as a standalone portrait mobile app with icons and theme colors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes, React Query client, telemetry provider, and protected dashboard layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Admin component displaying paginated audit logs with filtering by action type and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory, and query/update call counts with color-coded status indicators and critical threshold alerts.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart visualizing five biometric stress metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types over time with toggleable legend items and simulated real-time emotion data generation.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a simplified world map with animated node pulses representing distributed network activity across four global locations (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore).
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Shows a real-time area chart of network traffic with auto-updating data points that scroll horizontally as new traffic values are generated every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card component showing meeting details including title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary with encryption indicator.
Shows a live-updating cost tracker that increments at ₹12.5/second with pause/resume functionality to simulate meeting ROI calculation.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Renders a terminal-style scrolling log display showing simulated real-time security events across four categories (ENCRYPT, PACKET, NEURAL, QUANTUM) with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Displays a dashboard panel showing quantum encryption metrics including key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness score with animated indicators and color-coded status displays.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a table component displaying recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges to indicate different security levels and file statuses.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live-updating area chart tracking vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, with data points refreshing every 3 seconds to show sentiment analysis trends.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels, displaying each speaker with an avatar, progress bar, and dynamically updating activity percentages.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Implements a terminal-style scrolling log display showing real-time system security events across categories like encryption, authentication, network, and biometrics with timestamps and auto-scrolling functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Displays a grid matrix of threat detection cells showing attack vectors (phishing, malware, DDoS, zero-day) across different categories with color-coded severity levels and active threat indicators that update every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, duration, and volume over a 5-minute period. Includes real-time playback indicator and interactive segment selection with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wraps routes requiring authentication, checking for Internet Identity and AXON_SESSION in localStorage. Redirects to login if unauthenticated and shows a loading spinner during initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Enforces role-based access control by verifying user role (admin or user) via backend query. Redirects to dashboard with error toast if user lacks required permissions.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Renders a pulsing green dot with tooltip indicating active status. Uses shadcn/ui Tooltip component for hover interaction.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal displaying categorized keyboard shortcuts with search functionality. Opens with '?' key and organizes shortcuts into collapsible accordion sections by category.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component displaying a metric with title, value, icon, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow). Features emerald-themed hover effects.
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled button component with emerald gradient background, shadow effects, and hover animations. Wraps shadcn/ui Button with preset styling for primary call-to-action use.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Displays list of team members with avatars, roles, and revoke access buttons. Manages local state for member list and shows success toast on revocation.
Shows current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with crown icon and badge. Static display card with emerald-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Provides toggle switches for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode security features. Persists state to sessionStorage and logs events via telemetry context.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Animated canvas visualization showing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with pulsing emerald dots and glow effects. Uses requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation loop.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPIMet: Displays four KPI metric cards in a responsive grid: Total Secured Meetings, Active Global Nodes, Threats Neutralized (with bar chart), and Sovereign Health Score (with radial gauge).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Shows a system overview card with a primary Security Health KPI (98%) and grouped metrics for Network Stats (Active Sessions, Neural Efficiency) and User/Team Access (Team Members, Threats).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pricin: Renders two pricing tier cards (Basic at $299/month and Premium at $499/month) with feature lists and subscribe buttons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Securi: Displays a line chart showing security traffic volume trends over the last 7 days using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Provides a team member list with status indicators and revoke access functionality, showing toast notifications on member removal.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Shows a simple card listing team members with their active/idle status indicated by colored dots.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Displays a scrollable feed of telemetry events from TelemetryContext with timestamps and color-coded event types (success, warning, error).
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Shows a toggleable FPS counter overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures and displays real-time frame rate with color-coded performance indicators.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Renders an animated gradient border beam effect that moves diagonally across a component using CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: Renders an animated 3D orb with radial gradient, rotation animation, and hover-triggered ripple effects. Includes inline keyframe animations for rotation and ripple expansion.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React class component that catches errors in child components and displays a styled error card with retry and home navigation options. Logs errors to console and supports custom fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Wrapper component that renders a styled Card with optional BorderBeam effect, using backdrop blur and semi-transparent styling. Accepts children, className, and showBeam props.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with collapsible sidebar navigation, user profile display, and logout functionality. Includes navigation items for dashboard, security, team management, pricing, and settings with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with four-column grid layout displaying brand info, product links, resources, and legal links. Includes social media icons and copyright information.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic hover effect that translates based on mouse position relative to the button.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: Interactive biometric scanner component supporting fingerprint and face ID modes with animated scanning progress, haptic feedback, and success/error states. Simulates 2.5-second scan with 80% success rate.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Displays AI neural proxy status with conditional rendering showing either ready state (green checkmark) or standby state (loading spinner). Provides user feedback on AI voice twin activation status.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Circular progress indicator using SVG with gradient stroke that animates based on progress percentage. Displays numeric progress value and 'Synthesizing' label in center.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload zone for audio files with visual feedback on drag state. Filters for audio file types and displays uploaded files with metadata (name, size).
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Dashboard displaying three voice quality metrics (Pitch Stability, Clarity Index, Tone Quality) with percentage values, icons, and gradient progress bars. Uses grid layout for responsive display.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: A React component for scheduling security audit calls with date picker (excluding weekends) and time slot selection, displaying confirmation via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Monitors and displays dark web threats with filtering by type and severity, generates simulated threats periodically, and exports threat reports as CSV files.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: An audio environment mixer component with volume sliders for 8 different ambient soundscapes (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for tactical audio masking.
Displays a grid of 16 environment audio spoofing options with play/stop controls, allowing users to activate background audio for different locations.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Displays fake OS update screens (Windows 11 or macOS) in fullscreen mode to mimic system updates for privacy/security purposes.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Simulates network packet jitter with a slider control, displaying quality degradation, latency, and packet loss metrics, with Ctrl+Shift+L hotkey support.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fullscreen fake Windows update screen as a panic protocol, with animated progress bar and hidden Ctrl+Shift+Q shortcut to dismiss.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Allows users to select bandwidth quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) with live bandwidth usage meter and savings calculations, persisting selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Displays a scrollable terminal-style log of WebSocket connection events with timestamps, simulating periodic heartbeat and sync messages.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Renders a testimonial card with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: Full-screen transition component showing AXON logo with animated progress bar and scan line effect, calls onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: Fixed-position video widget with play/pause controls, minimize/maximize, and close functionality, displaying an operator briefing thumbnail.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: 3D globe visualization using Three.js showing global network nodes with color-coded latency indicators and animated connection arcs.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: Canvas-based audio wave visualizer rendering animated sine waves in blue and purple to simulate real-time frequency analysis.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: Canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that scrolls frequency bars downward, creating a cascading visualization of audio spectrum data.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider managing ghost mode state with sessionStorage persistence and toggle functionality.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: React context provider for logging and managing telemetry events with timestamps, types, and a 50-event limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Custom hook providing haptic feedback utilities with light, medium, and heavy vibration patterns using the Vibration API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Custom React hook that listens for keyboard shortcuts by tracking pressed keys and triggering callbacks when specified key combinations are detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Custom React hook that tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic events, audit logs, session recordings, and system health metrics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (dark blue sidebar, light background), utility classes for ghost mode blur, and keyframe animations for fade-in, scan lines, and pulse effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring, displaying current user profile and role information.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays a grid of encrypted meeting logs and intelligence reports, showing loading skeletons or empty state when no meetings exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying KPI metrics, security traffic trends, active identities, and a control panel in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page that displays a QR code for mobile pairing and a connection log, allowing users to pair mobile devices for remote control.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer metrics page showing system health data including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage with historical charts, and critical threshold alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, security features showcase, testimonials, and CTAs to drive users to login/signup for the AXON platform.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page offering Google sign-up and Internet Identity login options, managing session state and redirecting authenticated users to the command center.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-optimized biometric authentication page with a back button and BiometricScanner component for fingerprint/face verification.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Voice cloning interface with vocal sample upload, neural synthesis controls, progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Security countermeasures dashboard featuring emergency panic mode, environment spoofing, packet jitter simulation, hardware mimicry, and environment mixing controls.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Performance settings page containing bandwidth optimization controls for system tuning.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Empty signup page component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Pricing page displaying Basic (₹299/month) and Premium (₹499/month) subscription tiers with feature lists and simulated subscription flow.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile tactical control interface with large touch buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric authentication with haptic feedback.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: React page component that renders a team management interface with a title, description, and an ActiveIdentitiesCard component for managing team members and access levels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract, store, and manage URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings including container queries, typography, animations, and custom design tokens for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata file tracking feature requests and architectural state, currently documenting a pending request to remove Basic ($299) and Premium ($499) pricing plans from the dashboard.
